data.sampled:
Loxorix vim ex ipsay ethay esay adipsayingelay,ayseday foray ethay temproray incibaydiddunktbay laborbay equalrayethay muggenay alkway vimay exsay,aysay,aysay,aysay...

The above sentence has been translated into Pig Latin, a simple language that uses words from English but replaces common consonants with other letters to make them easier to pronounce. For example, the letter "e" at the end of a word is usually replaced by an apostrophe followed by the first letter of the word (in this case, "s"). This makes it easier for children and non-native speakers of English to learn how to read and write the language.

In this case, we have applied the following translation rules:

* Replace all occurrences of the letter "I" with the sound "ay".
* Add an apostrophe followed by the next letter of the word to any single consonant at the end of a word.
* Add an apostrophes before any double or triple consonants that appear together at the end of a word.

By applying these rules, we can transform complex sentences such as "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua." into more basic ones like "Loxtory imus dorusay ethay ethay epseeppinglay,ayseday formay ethay tempowray incibiddaydoontday ut labboresay ethay emoraelyagay."

This process helps simplify difficult texts so they become easier to understand for those who may not be familiar with the original language or subject matter. By using tools like these, we can

Here are some general guidelines on how to write good chatbot prompts:

1. Be specific and clear in your question or request. Providing contextual details helps me understand what kind of response you expect.
2. Use proper grammar, punctuation, and capitalization. This makes it easier for me to comprehend and respond accordingly.
3. Avoid using abbreviations or slang unless they are widely understood by most people. If necessary, explain any unfamiliar terms or acronyms used.
4. Ask follow-up questions or refine your inquiry based on my responses to ensure we remain focused on achieving your goal.

Code spaces are available for all repositories on GitHub Free, Pro, Enterprise, Gold, Platinum, and Education accounts. They provide a fully immersive development experience that allows developers to work together more efficiently than ever before. With built-in collaboration tools like chat, file sharing, screen sharing, and video conferencing, Code Spaces make remote working seamless and intuitive.
To learn more about using Code Spaces, visit our documentation at docs.github.com/features/codespaces or contact our support team at [support@github.com](mailto:support@github.com).
